trans-unit.source: A class that enables you to associate easing functions with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> key frame animation.
trans-unit.target: 使你能够将缓动函数与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 关键帧动画相关联的类。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using an object similar to this one, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame>.
trans-unit.target: 使用与此类似的对象的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame>。

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Size> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: 此类用作的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrameCollection>结合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimationUsingKeyFrames>要进行动画处理<xref:System.Windows.Size>根据一组关键帧的属性值。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame> interpolates between the <xref:System.Windows.Size> value of the previous key frame and its own value linearly with an easing function to produce its output value.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame>之间进行内插<xref:System.Windows.Size>的上一个关键帧和其自身的值以线性方式通过缓动函数来生成其输出值的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingSizeKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingSizeKeyFrame" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingSizeKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingSizeKeyFrame" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingSizeKeyFrame" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingSizeKeyFrame" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The initial key time.
trans-unit.target: 初始关键时间。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingSizeKeyFrame" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> value and key time.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingSizeKeyFrame" /> 值和关键时间初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The initial key time.
trans-unit.target: 初始关键时间。

trans-unit.source: The easing function.
trans-unit.target: 缓动函数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingSizeKeyFrame" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> value, key time, and easing function.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingSizeKeyFrame" /> 值、关键时间和缓动函数初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 派生类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 在创建派生类时，必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新实例。

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: 动画类间接继承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您需要重写<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>方法来构造自定义的动画对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a typical implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的典型实现<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the easing function applied to the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用于关键帧的缓动函数。

trans-unit.source: The easing function applied to the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 应用于关键帧的缓动函数。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingSizeKeyFrame.EasingFunction" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingSizeKeyFrame.EasingFunction" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: 动画起始值。

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: 一个介于 0.0 和 1.0 之间的值（包含 0.0 和 1.0），该值指定此关键帧已经过去的时间的百分比。

trans-unit.source: Interpolates, according to the easing function used, between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame, using the supplied progress increment.
trans-unit.target: 根据所使用的缓动函数，利用提供的进度增量在前一个关键帧的值和当前关键帧的值之间进行插值。

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: 给定了指定基值和进度时此关键帧的输出值。
